name: Youth Organisation ALEXIS Prilep
goal:
Our mission is the social inclusion of young people and youth workers in order to provide a greater impact on their social and psychological development for gaining self-confidence and equality through participation, policy making, lifelong learning, training, and decision-making.

Our youth workers and advisоrs provide an educational and intuitive environment with activities that foster creativity and promotion of fundamental rights through non-formal learning. Through youth events, young people with fewer opportunities can work with other young people on topics and workshops that facilitate tolerance and active citizenship at Union level.
interests: Budget, Education and training, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Taxation, Youth
euInitiatives:
• Young people and decision-makers in a dialogue;
• Active citizenship, democracy, solidarity and fundamental rights;
• Civic and democratic participation of young people at EU level;
• Equal opportunities, life perspectives and a sense of social purpose, freedom of expression and building peaceful communities.
